issue.title: Windows: Fixed swapped colors for custom cursors
issue.body:
Previously the red and blue color channels were swapped,
since Windows expects a different channel order for DIBs.

This fixes issue #1464.

body: Branch `bugfix/windows-cursor-colors` should fix this, give it a spin, if you can.
For the future just keep your issue open until it's indeed merged/fixed in master branch. :)

issue.title: Fixed Windows cursor color conversion to be endian safe
issue.body:
The fix implemented by #1465 wasn't endian-safe so this fixes that.

## Tasks

* [X] Tested on Windows

## How to test this PR?

To test, follow the instruction from the original issue: #1464
